c-page-heading.text: What do I need to know about flying with children?

atoms-p.text: We want to make travelling with children easier, and to support this we will promise that:

items.text: If you’re travelling with children under 5, we’ll board you early;
You can bring two items for free including a push chair, buggy or car seat;
You can choose your seats in advance to ensure you sit together;
We have kids snack packs onboard, with games to keep kids entertained;
We support breastfeeding mothers and you can feed your baby on board at any time

atoms-p.text: To help you, here’s how we differentiate between infants and children:

items.text: An infant is anyone younger than 2 years old; and a child is 2 years and above.
At 16 they are considered an adult.
